{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents mention that the upper lip forms from the maxillary, medial nasal, and lateral nasal prominences. These facial prominences arise from ventrally migrating neural crest cells in combination with the head ectoderm and mesoderm. Therefore, the mesodermal basis of the lateral part of the lip is formed by the maxillary process.", "answer_choice": "B"}
